Body: Possible Duplicate:  Google play disappeared from my phone  I have a Samsung Galaxy S and have recently discovered that the Google Play app has disappeared from my phone. I am not sure when this happened. I recently did an update, so this may have been the cause, or I may have done some mistake. How can I get it back, as I am unable to download any new apps to my phone.  I recently uninstalled Words with Friends as it had locked up, and now I can not re install it. HELP!!
Title: Google Play app dissappeared

history.Text: I have a Samsung Galaxy S and have recently discovered that the Google Play app has disappeared from my phone. I am not sure when this happened. I recently did an update, so this may have been the cause, or I may have done it error. How can I get it back, as I am unable to download any new apps to my phone.  I recently uninstalled Words with Friends as it had locked up, and now I can not re install it. HELP!!
